summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5848 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 56, Gilman Park Addition, being the alley between Market Street and West 56th Street, from 17th Avenue Northwest to 20th Avenue Northwest; and certain parts of certain other alleys, streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 77108, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
